title: Charles Cambier
text:
Charles Cambier (5 January 1884 – 16 October 1955) was a <a href="Belgium">Belgian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player who played his whole career for <a href="Club%20Brugge%20K.V.">Club Brugge</a>.
Cambier also played for the <a href="Belgium%20national%20football%20team">Belgium national football team</a>, scoring 3 goals for 23 caps.
